name: Velvet Blur Matte Lipstick Balm
about: What it is: A cushiony and hydrating lipstick-balm hybrid for high-pigment, matte color with up to 12 hours of wear..Formulation Type: Lipstick..Benefits: Hydrating, Long-wearing.Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Deliver a rush of color in one swipe with this weightless, moisture-infused matte formula. It feels as light as air once applied and lasts for up to 12 hours. The custom dome-shaped tip hugs your lips and makes it easy to glide while on the go.
ingredients: -Smart-Blur Powders: A silky-smooth, flake-free finish...Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyethylene, Octyldodecanol, Aluminum Hydroxide, Polysilicone-11, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Synthetic Beeswax, Dicalcium Phosphate, Hydrated Silica, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax (Copernicia Cerifera Cera), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil (Ricinus Communist Seed Oil), Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil. May contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 7 (CI 15850), Red 6 (CI 15850) Red 7 Lake (CI 15859), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For a full-coverage finish, glide domed tip across lips..-For a bitten, blurred effect, gently tap onto lips with the pad of your finger.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried to love this product but it dried out my lips and I couldnu2019t stand the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after an influencer I follow said this was a non-drying matte lipstick, and I've been looking for one for a while. It is creamy and smooth, unlike most matte lipsticks I've tried, and I really like this. However, the color is not red -- at least not on me. It has too much orange undertones, and I like my reds to be deep with blue undertones. I was hoping there would be other colors to choose from, but the selection is limited. I wanted to like this so much but because of the color, I give this 3 stars. I'll watch this line to see if they introduce more colors in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is sooo good! it makes my lips feel moisturizered and my fav thing that drew me to this product is def the unique packaging. i love the shape and size and how compact it is to carry around. the color pay off is good as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Velvet Blur in Sahara is a fantastic matte lipstick balm. It absolutely feels and looks like a lipstick balm. It feels so comfortable on the lips but still offers really nice color. The matte formula is so comfortable and feels so soft on my lips. This shade is my perfect nude color and lasts a long time. The packaging is so cool and I love that itu2019s magnetic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.  First off the packaging is so so cute. I also love the color as it's perfect for the colder fall and winter weather. The formula is nice on the lips and doesn't make my lips dry out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product when I heard about the velvet blur line!! I wasnu2019t sure if the shade would look good on me but even just trying it on without makeup it looked so pretty and natural. Definitely buildable and looks so natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! I got the shade u201cwindburnu201d and itu2019s the perfect every day mauve/pink shade. Itu2019s a nice full coverage with the CUTEST packaging ever! It lasts for a couple hours and is perfect for layering with a gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am new to this brand but I absolutely love this lipstick. It has amazing coverage and lasts a while as well. I normally hate the texture of matte lipsticks but I don't mind this one. I didn't feel like my lips were dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is changing the lip gloss game because it feels really light and it looks great and it lasts a long time. I have always been a lipgloss girly, but this is definitely changing me into a color Matte

Outstanding color and wear. I have finished dinner and drinks- it has not budged. I know itu2019s not necessarily marketed as super long wearing however it wears beautifully. The packaging is so luxurious. Need more colors!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful lipstick with a gorgeous shade range. Matte but not drying Love this brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: wanted this to be great... it is very dry looking, and the color looks different on the skin than in the tube.  cute packaging but not a fan of the lipstick, unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts a long time on my lips gorgeous color and really innovative packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Very smooth great color! Great spring/summer color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent product. I love using it as a lip and cheek product. The packaging is also very nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just ordered Suede, already have Raven purchased off their site. Love it in Raven so much, used a lot on a roadtrip. Matte, not drying for me as a vaseline lippie girl. Not a mess like some lippies, LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very cute packaging and I actually loved the color, BUT its super drying!! I wanted to love it so bad but ended up returned it after two days, lips were literally cracking from how dry they got. I would expect much more for $36.    for $36.  end

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color is there but there is barely any product for such a big price, and I also don't see the 'balm' effect. The packaging is pretty and minimalistic, I like the magnetic feature! If you don't bother adding a hydrating lip balm in your bag and you want to spend money, go for it...

reviews.review_title: NOT WORTH IT! Donu2019t buy it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth $36, you can find better products at the drug store. Smells like pepto and the fact that you get 30 GRAMS! For that amount of money itu2019s crazy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color- I had my color analysis done and Iu2019m a summer with neutral undertones leaning cool- and this is a gorgeous color on me. Bummer that itu2019s super drying tho. You realllly have to hydrate your lips before, during and after use. Iu2019d return it but already threw away the box. Love the container.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: SO AWFUL it actualy made my lips so dry and cracked they BLED! no pigment at all did not eat I am afraid it threw up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this Simihaze lipstick after a friend recommended it. Very rich color and staying power. It also didnu2019t dry out my lips, wh was a worry. Unique packaging. Pricey, but worth it to me.

reviews.review_title: not worth the 36, you can get better for cheaper
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: goes on smoothly but the product is so beyond drying. drier than a normal matte lipstick/ liquid lipstick. I need to add lipgloss to make it comfortable. Not worth the $36 either

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice,  clean, great look! Very cute and fun colors. I pick the pink one. Looks great! It is a very matte finish! Overall solid make up, will check out more in their collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Truly one of the worst products I have tried. Donu2019t waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is so flattering, I have light-medium skin and my friend has darker skin, we both have it and are in love!! I was hesitant because it was matte, but It is long-wearing and one of the only lipsticks I have ever used which is not drying! Highly recommend! I hope they come out with more shades soon

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed. I usually will blend in this lipstick with my finger and it leaves me with an airbrushed look. Like it looks like you edited my lips on the computer but itu2019s real life. Also the texture on is creamy but it looks more mat

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's like dried pepto bismol - chalky and lurid in color - hard pass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this product a negative million stars I would extremely drying had a chemically taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Drying and poor pigment. Also insanely expensive for how bad it is. Doesnu2019t hold a candle to Ilia lip balm. If youu2019re going to go for one of these things, Ilia is so much better

reviews.review_title: Not a must have or must try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just too much money for what you get. Cool packaging but product nothing special. A matte lipstick with balm texture, and it feels good. The color is a pretty rosey color that would suit all skin tones. Gives that blurred effect if you sort of just dab it on and then press it in with your finger. I wanted the lava shade but it was sold out. This was the next best color for the blurred French girl look. Doesnu2019t last that long. Isnu2019t drying. Tried on my cheeks. Looked bad. But to be fair itu2019s not marketed for cheeks. Comfortable, nice color, yet not something I will reach for often. Price point based on the product itself should be somewhere around Tower, Kaja, Glossier, so youu2019re paying for the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first saw this, it was the packaging that intrigued me, I do not normally prefer matte lipstick, but after using the ND hydrating matte, I was hoping to find a formula like it but in a brighter shade, received this today and put it on immediately, and it really does hydrate, it feels like there is nothing on your lips, but you also do not need a balm.  The packaging has another great thing going for it too, I can literally toss this into my purse and be able to find it anywhere, it doesn't need to be in a purse pocket, or makeup bag, it is a cute handful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love to use this when Iu2019m sick of the glossy look. Matte but not too dry of a matte. Just perfect ud83dudc4cud83cudffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it has a matte look while still moisturizing! These reviews are a bit odd and clearly were written with an ulterior motive. The color is fab just wish it had a bit more staying power but packaging is luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely stunning color and formulae. Packaging is super cute and unique. Will def restock.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was terrible. Super dry and smelled bad. Donu2019t waste your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed!!! Loving the formula and color, canu2019t wait to buy the other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this feels on the lips. Also multi use for a monotone look! Loooooove this, need in every color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Will never purchase from simi haze again, horrible

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This worked for me as a blush! Glad I tried it because as a lipstick it was too drying, powdery feel I didnu2019t care for. Iu2019m happy I didnu2019t return it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This color is vibrant and commands attention.  Perfect with a summer tan and bronze, sun kissed, minimal makeup but I am sure will be totally stunning in the winter with a cat eye.  Iu2019m obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is sooo cute!  It says itu2019s a lipstick plus lip balm. However, It feels more like a lipstick to me than a lip balm.I use a lip oil on top to make my lips hydrated.  I am a big fan if nude color lipsu2026 I like the color so much. I would like to buy another color also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite! I love the way it has staying power and the way it feels on my lips color is beautiful as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not necessarily this shade (For some reason I had to chose a shade in order to write a review), but whatu2019s with a price of the product? Almost $50 for a balm thatu2019s really nothing special? Come onu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and the color. Itu2019s matte but feels creamy in the lips. Stays all day. Wish they had more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: do not buy this product. It gave me internal rashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was the first and last time I buy something I saw in an Instagram ad.  This is NOT a lip balm.  It looks NOTHING like the videos of women putting it on their lips.  This is a full on matte lipstick and it was so much darker and uglier than it looked online and in the video.  I'm disgusted that I paid so much for something so terrible.  AND to top it off, Sephora's return policy is a mere 30 days versus the normal 60-90 days so I'm stuck with this ugliness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am confused about this formula?!  It goes on smooth and wears beautifully but it definitely more of a matte lipstick than a balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color, it's what I've been searching for, and it truly matches the color of chapped/windburned lips. My only complaint is that it's very drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ok product, very over priced for how little product you get. The peach color is more of a bright pink. The packaging is bulky, so if you carry a small purse this is going to take up space. Will be returning.

reviews.review_title: Not worth the product.  Packaging cute
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hmmmm really great fun solid packaging but not word the product. Nice color but very easily replaced by another product. I didnu2019t think the color or formula were worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought some products from their original websites after seeing it on social media, and i just learned that they were also on sephora, so I thought my reviews could help some people !  u2022 The lipstick is very creamy which makes it easier to apply. u2022 The color is not as pigmented as I thought but it's a little lighter than a real red. u2022 The packaging is original, its very simple yet 'modern' compared to other lipstick. u2022 The product is sample sized... u2022 It's slightly overpriced for the amount of product.  u2022 It can last a day with the setting spray ! u2022 It says that it's hydrating but it isn't. I have to apply gloss after i put it....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this product, especially with this super cool modern packaging. The balm itself is like a comfortable matte lipstick, and windburn is a pretty warm dusty rose. Nothing particular special about the formula. Iu2019m most disappointed in the packaging. I donu2019t like the look or feel in person. It has the look of an unfinished stone and just isnu2019t as cool in person. Because the formula is average and the packaging isnu2019t as cool as I wanted it to be I think itu2019s not worth it. Especially at the price point. In contrast, a friend of mine loves this, so to each their own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this matte lip balm is everything so so good in texture and stays for good long hours! Definitely smudge proof ! High-performance, skincare-infused makeup with unique sensorial textures that enhance, not cover. Designed for ultimate creativity, blendability, and versatility. For day-to-night and on-the-go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I grabbed this because of the package, of course. I didn't expect to like this but the formula turns out to be so nice. It applies like a velvet matte but does keep the lips hydrated. What blown me away is that the formula lasts a good amount of time unless you eat greasy food. I wore this as a lip balm for a run and it lasted through all the humid and sweat. My lip balm/product's color usually disappears after my workout. Very impressed because of that. Got this in Windburn and I find it to be a mauve-y pink. Great for fall and beyond.

reviews.review_title: Cool fresh new design, $36 is not expensive IMHO
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Completely honest and impartial review warning!   Okay, this is a new brand and as I understand itu2019s family-owned (which is a good thing though, Iu2019d rather support new brands than give my money to the monstrous conglomerates like Estee Lauder and such).   The lipstick costs $36 which seems appropriate for a luxury brand (I donu2019t get it why so many people complain about the price, like have you been in Sephora recently?).   Pros:   - gliding properties are good, the application is smooth and the color payoff is instant. - the design of the case definitely looks fresh and interesting, Iu2019m so tired of all these never-ending yellow-rose gold obsessed brands, theyu2019re so omnipresent that you, at times, canu2019t tell which is which (like can you really tell if itu2019s Tom Ford, Patrick Ta or Hourglass instantly? I doubt that). The color of the case is pretty and very Gen Z.   Cons:   - case: although I appreciate the effort to invent something new design-wise in the beauty world full of drab lipsticks with repetitive patterns, I cannot really say that the case is perfect for me. Yes, itu2019s nice, it feels luxurious, itu2019s very unique, but also itu2019s very heavy and bulky. Material-wise it was not a good idea to use magnets (even Tom Ford doesnu2019t use them anymore) because it is not environmentally-friendly and magnets are not recyclable at all.  - the design and the color of the case call for a clean formula, but this lipstick is surprisingly u201cnon-cleanu201d. Itu2019s like a very old-fashioned full of silicones and other bad ingredients lipstick in a 2022 case.   - the lipstick is very drying.  - Itu2019s only 3 g (given the very big case!!!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like all the reviews for this product are paid for. I NEVER take the time to leave negative reviews but if zero stars were an option, I choose that instead of one. The product feels like cheap clown or kids makeup. I expected more out of a product of this price point.  Not sure what Sephora was thinking carrying this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product applied so beautifully I am amazed with the results. The ingredients are on the good side so I was hesitant about the product effectiveness. Overall so happy with this product will purchase myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For starters the packaging was so cool! I really loved the color I got. It felt very pigmented and creamy. This has to be one of my favorite lipsticks so far. It also lasted for quite some time. I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best feature about this product is its light and purse friendly. I don't drive so a set of functional make up items in my purse is a must. This product is cute and doesn't take a lot of space. I wished it lasted longer but it's good enough for me as a commuter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic product. Matte but somehow moisturizing.  Doesnu2019t bleed or get messy while wearing though it does transfer. Packaging is magnetic and beautiful. Color is very opaque. I am a lipstick snob and love this.   I am a lipstick anob and love this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is so cute. The packaging is unique and looks like a jade crystal. I also like that the case is magnetic and won't open up in my purse. The lip balm itself is more like a lip tint or sheer listick and not like a balm. I like that coverage is buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was mediocre at best. The formula applied very spotty and was pretty drying. The color itself was much warmer than I wanted. The pics weren't super clear on whether the color was a cool brown pink, or more of an orange. It's definitely more orange than pink.  I'm surprised to see all the positive feedback on the packaging. It's completely form over function. Yes it has magnetic closure, but the outer part of the tube was way too big for how small the actual product stick is. It's obnoxious, takes up a ton of room in my purse and does NOT fit well in a clutch or pocket. This was my first purchase from this brand and I probably won't waste money on further products from them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been curious about these since they popped up on my Facebook feed, and I was glad to see them come to Sephora.  The color is flattering, and while a bit heavy on the lips, the formula definitely feels nourishing, not drying.  I also appreciate that they're easy to use and don't really require lip liner - which is good, because they're definitely not transfer-proof and will require reapplication after eating/drinking.  What primarily keeps this from being a five-star review is that the product does settle into lip lines - and the packaging, while cute, is cumbersome.  Still, I would consider purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly was skeptical since I only heard about this brand from Jenni Blackpink. But the cute packaging and the need for a good velvet lipstick made me buy this. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. The pigment is perfect, the color is very pretty, and for a velvet lipstick itu2019s not drying my lips and  actually feels hydrating. Definitely buying a different color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth it IMO. Goes on kind of patchy and is a really light unflattering color. Buildable though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to test out, and I was so amazed by the packaging! Itu2019s so interesting and kind of has this magnetic close. Coming to the actual product, itu2019s very creamy and easy to blend out. I love to use this for my natural looks, and it compliments the look beautifully! Love to use my fingers to blend the color out! Makes it look really soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t hesitate BUY IT! Iu2019ve always wanted to try simihaze and am so happy theyu2019re at Sephora! Very pigmented and feels so nice on the lips and lasts! Love this color but way more pigmented than I thought so Iu2019m going to order windburn as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this. It's not too drying on the lips. I also love that you can build up the color too. You go for a blotted lip with sheer coverage, of full lipstick with full coverage. Such a unique product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been super cautious of matte lip products in the past because they have worn so weirdly on my lips and tend to either actually dry them out or feel super drying. Thatu2019s not the case with this lippie, I canu2019t believe how buttery and smooth this goes on, it glides on, is buildable and is matte. This has totally changed my perspective on matte lips. I will say that the packaging, although fun, is a bit clunky. Other than that fantastic lipstick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SIMIHAZE VELVET BLUR is a very unique product. The color is very pigmented,yet sheer.I know sounds crazy,but you have to actually buy and use the product to understand. My lips are super smooth and moisturized while wearing this product. I also love how cute and different the packaging is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving the SIMIHAZE Velvet Blur Matte Lip Balm.  I love that the balm is hydrating but also a nice matte finish. I can wear this as full coverage by gliding the dome tip across my lips or by just patting the color on my finger for a blurred effect depending on my mood or what I have going on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip product. It glides on nicely and is not tacky or sticky. True true matte but does not dry out your lips. The packaging is one of a kind and I just love the magnetic closure, itu2019s very strong and satisfying to close.

reviews.review_title: More of a matte lipstick than a balm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wouldnu2019t call this a lip balm. Itu2019s more of a lipstick. A lip balm is more sheer and this is full pigment. Besides that, this is very comfortable and long wearing. It also plays really well with lipgloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a flattering lip product! I love that I can adjust it depending on whether I want a more subtle or full glam look since you can build it up to be more opaque. Itu2019s very cute and easy to throw in my purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a lovely looking lip balm! I love how simple , yet elegant looking packaging is. The Windburn shade is truly beautiful and goes perfectly well with my skin tone. The lip balm feels so soft and creamy as it glides very nicely and smoothly on the lip. This Velvet Blur lip balm provides a nice matte finish with it gorgeous pigmented color. It's buildable and has a decent lasting effect, and it doesn't make my lip look and feel dry at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color of the lip balm is so pretty. I love that its matte. It is perfectly pigmented, hydrating and very flattering. I love the cute magnetic packaging. The texture of the product is so smooth and sometimes I use it as a blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Matte lip balm. My new favorite & 'Lava is the perfect shade. So perfectly pigmented, hydrating, and flattering. This lip balm is so much better as far as long-lasting power is considered. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try out the SIMIHAZE Velvet Blur Matte Lip Balm in the shade Sunrise. I loved the packaging; fun colors and magnetic closure. I liked the shade and the dome shape of the lip balm. The shape does help when it comes to application. However, I think the pigmentation of the balm could have been deeper. The formula also could have been more moisturizing, I found it to be drying. Overall, I say, give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this packaging. Itu2019s cute and different. The formula is nice but really nothing special. Itu2019s not drying but just not the most hydrating, itu2019s opaque for a balm and wears nicely but just not sure itu2019s worth the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These velvet haze lip balms are incredible! I love that they're matte but also feel hydrating on my lips. They give my lips the healthiest flush to them. It's hard to describe but I've never tried anything like this. I hose the shade sunrise and it's so beautiful. I will definitely be grabbing a couple more shades. I love the packaging too. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lipsticku2019s aesthetic is unique and different but very well packaged. The lipstick itself is great!! Itu2019s Matte and super pigmented. It glides on easily and doesnu2019t feel drying at all. Iu2019m a big fan of the color and will definitely be looking into other colors in the collection as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so obsessed with the texture of this product! It feels so light and natural on my lips and itu2019s extremely pigmented. This is honestly one of the best matte lip formulas Iu2019ve ever tried. I want to try all the shades now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipstick! Aside from the cute magnetic packaging, this product is actually a like 3 in 1. I can use it as a sheer lip tint by applying once, or as a regular lipstick by applying more than once. And finally I can even use it as a blush if I apply it to my cheeks and dab it with my finger or a beauty blender!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Simihaze - especially this product. I love the versatility in being minimalist but being able to max it out for a gorgeous night out. Additionally, the packaging is so cute and unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: VELVET BLUR x SEPHORA In Lava! Love the color and how I can make it as sheer or full as I want. I tied it on my lips as a tint and cheeks as a blush. It can also be used as a crime effect shadow in your lids, just use a primer so it wonu2019t crease.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love my lip balm, the packaging is so cool. But what i love the most about this is the top is magnetic so it stays shut ! The color is so beautiful and feels so smooth and not dry like other matte lipsticks ! I already purchased my 2nd one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on this lipstick is so cool! I love the mint green color and the magnetic snap closure.  Itu2019s a little bulky but still so cool looking.  The color is a pretty my lips but better shade. I can imagine this looking pretty on most people as itu2019s very neutral. The color is pigmented and even though itu2019s matte it doesnu2019t feel dry or uncomfortable on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful lip balm. The packaging first off is stunning. Heavy and nothing like anything else on the market. The product itself is beautiful, matte and very hydrating. Stays put on the lips for a while. Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is really fun and I like the magnetic closure on the case. It may not be the most practical (sort of wide and thick) but cool none the less. The balm itself does look beautiful on, being matte but not drying and I love that it can be built up and more pigmented or worn more sheer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the distinctive and sturdy packaging that this brand uses! Itu2019s super easy to find in my bag and the strong magnetic cap feels so satisfying to open and close. The product itself goes on like a satin-y stick and doesnu2019t make my lips feel dry. The formula is in between matte and velvet and gives a nice ombre affect without any effort. The color is easily layerable and feels good on the lips. My only complaint is that if your lips are already dry it may require some patting with the fingers to blend in better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing lipstick!! Lasts all day!! Super rich color. The container is so cool!! And its a magnet so it stays shut in my purse.  The color is beautiful and I recieved so many complements on my lipstick. I highly recommend this product. I will purchase in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I believe the description for this is correct, this is indeed a matte lipstick/balm. Very matte but not drying. Glides effortlessly on the lips and is very opaque. Great color payoff and very comfortable. Decent lasting power and the packaging is very cool.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is just so cute and it fits perfect in a purse. The shade is a bit different on the lips vs in the pictures, itu2019s more darker and has almost orange tint to it. Very comfortable on the lips, doesnu2019t feel drying and itu2019s pretty pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, let me address the obvious: the packaging is super unique and beautiful. I love the magnetic snap closure as well. I was shocked at how pigmented this product is when I first tried it. Iu2019d consider this a pretty full coverage hydrating lipstick. However, I found the rounded tip to be a nightmare for application. I couldnu2019t get a smooth edge and it just made a simple process more complicated than it needed to be because every imperfection was so obvious. If it was sheer coverage it wouldnu2019t be as big of a deal. Itu2019s also a slightly patchy but nothing a couple layers canu2019t fix. Oh & itu2019s very long wearing. Overall itu2019s a good, innovative product that needs some tweaking to be perfect. As far as lava red goes, it leans kind of neutral. Not blue enough for my preference to make my teeth pop, but close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is truly amazing. This is the only lipstick that will give my lips rich matte color without drying them out! It goes on very nicely and smooth. Lasted me about 8 hours without reapplying! Great color choices. I use it as a blush as well! Super!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It has multi-coverage use, you can layer this great for a more intense look. The shape of the tip is great. I recommend this velvet blur

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and the overall brand. It is perfect for a dewy, minimalist look or can be used to create a maximized night-out look. I even love using this on my cheeks to give my skin more color. Absolutely love
The formula is nice and comfortable, it appears Matt and the color is pretty. The packaging is so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so cute! I love the overall look of the packaging & how easy it is to use. This color matches great with darker complexions. Itu2019s a subtle edgy red without being over the top. Works great as blush too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a unique product. I wasn't sure what to expect when I saw the matte lipstick balm name, but now I see that it's referring to the versatility of this product. It can be used as a sheer wash of color, or built up for full opacity. It's not drying and doesn't emphasize my dry lips. Also the packaging is undeniably luxurious without being predictable. It has a magnetic closure, and soft touch finish which makes it feels special and like something I want to reach for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how hydrated this matte lipstick was. It didnu2019t leave my lips feeling sticky at all. I like how your apply to apply it two different ways depending on how you want it to look. I wanted a bold look so went with the sliding across my lips. It is small and compact and is easy to carry around in my small purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a velvety blur Matte lip balm that gives my lips hydration and stay for 12 hours. While I wear this I donu2019t feel anything on my lips. I use this in two ways as a full coverage I glide the domed tip directly to my lips. And for a bitten blurred effect I tap the lip balm on my lips. I like this and I loved itu2019s cute packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is out of control good! I love the formula and how it applies- it's easy to use just a drop of build up color for more coverage, which is great. I really like that it is matte and has a domed tip for application!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip color is perfect with my skintone color. I lined it with a red lip liner and applied the matte lipstick to my lips. It was such a beautiful color. It truly stood out and I received so many compliments when I wore it. It was the perfect shade. Very easy to apply and also to remove when I used a makeup wipe. I look forward to trying more of their colors. It was very long lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this Velvet Blur Lip Balm in the color Lava complimentary from Simihaze in exchange for my honest review. It's a very pretty color, and it definitely goes on very matte and lasts for a decent amount of time for a lip balm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is so cute! The packaging is awesome, super unique and will be easy to find in the bottom of your purse, plus itu2019s magnetic! Also love the color and the way it applies to the lips. Feels more like a balm than a drying lipstick! Love it.

Such a fun packaging, love the creativity. It's a beautiful shade with a great color payoff. Feels very comfortable on the lips and wears nicely, doesn't accentuate dry spots on my lips. Would love to try more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is truly the most beautiful lip balm! The packaging is like art -- it's so chic! The balm goes on really easy and gives a lovely pigment without being too heavy. I've been using this a lot and it's real hydrating and also a nice pop of color! Can't wait to try more shades.This is truly the most beautiful lip balm! The packaging is like art -- it's so chic! The balm goes on really easy and gives a lovely pigment without being too heavy. I've been using this a lot and it's real hydrating and also a nice pop of color! Can't wait to try more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip color from Simi Haze. This is the first product that I have tried from this brand and Iu2019m impressed! I absolutely love the packaging. The component is heavy and luxe. Itu2019s a matte green stone type of texture and the case has a magnetic closure which I love. It looks nice on my vanity. The pigment itself is pretty. I am fair skinned with cool undertones and the shade Windburn looks great on me IMO.  I havenu2019t mastered the sheer pigment trick but when I apply as a lipstick the color is very opaque. The formula is not drying and it feels quite light weight. Almost as if I have nothing on my lips. I have mixed feelings about the domed tip but so far itu2019s worked well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about choosing this color because it looked so dark for me. I normally choose a natural color when it comes to lipsticks and lipgloss, but once I tried this product I was completely shocked! It is such a deep red, but when I applied it you couldnu2019t hardly even tell I applied anything on my lips. Itu2019s like a lightly shaded lip balm is pretty much what this is, so donu2019t let the u201cbrightnessu201d of the shade scare you. I love this product and I will be recommending to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Folks, do not be fooled by the name of this product. This is no matte lip balm. Itu2019s matte, but definitely not a lip balm. It is definitely more akin to a lipstick (before anyone thinks, u201cwell the name on Sephora says lipstick balm,u201d it is described as a matte lip balm on the box itself). I was really intrigued by this because itu2019s supposed to be a matte lip balm, which sounds like an oxymoron. Sadly, Iu2019m a bit let down as this definitely applies and feels more like the traditional lip stick. The packaging is interesting because it resembles a large pill to me. Itu2019s also very weighty and the cap is held to the base of the lipstick by a magnet. There is no fragrance, which is a plus. The actual lip u201cbalmu201d itself, if used very gently and in only a couple thin layers, can look like a slight tint. In the picture attached (taken with flash), I used a normal amount of pressure to swatch it, and it is already pretty pigmented. The actual product on my lips feels slightly drying, definitely not moisturizing like a lip balm should be. It dries down matte and does not heavily emphasize chapped lips, provided that I didnu2019t go ham with the application. It has fairly little transfer when I pressed a tissue paper on top of my lips. Overall, itu2019s awful as a matte u201clip balm,u201d but decent if you use it as a matte lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the VELVET BLUR x SEPHORA lipstick. I received it in the color sunrise, and itu2019s such a pretty color! It may not be my shade exactly but the lipstick feels amazing in. Lastly the packaging is outstanding, so beautiful and unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the VELVET BLUR x SEPHORA lipstick. I received it in the color sunrise, and itu2019s such a pretty color! It may not be my shade exactly but the lipstick feels amazing on. Lastly the packaging is outstanding, so beautiful and unique!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pigmented and stays on all night ! Iu2019m obsessed with the results and how Matte it is but it does not dry your lips , the packaging is so cute and itu2019s perfect size to carry in your bag everywhere you go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is everything. If you are an aesthetic queen, this is for you. I received this complimentary for testing purposes and I've fallen in love. Very hydrating with a natural finish! I love the dome shape. Perfect for application :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a unique lip product and one of my new favorite products. When applied it is the perfect hybrid of a lip balm and a lipstick,which results in a dreamy combination. The texture is so creamy and emollient like a rich balm yet it dries down to a deeply pigmented, beautiful matte finish. The application is so smooth and easy due to a unique dome shaped tip that allows you to precisely apply the color in one sweep. The color of this product is a rich,deeply pigmented shade that can be used as a sheer or can be built up to a stunning full coverage shade with a staying power of up to 12 hours.  I absolutely love this lip color product and will definitely be purchasing other colors,as they have gorgeous shades to choose from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely a buildable coverage - but not super sheer even when applied lightly. Not as hydrating as I would have liked but nice when worn over a lip balm or with a gloss or oil on top. Super super cute packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the unique packaging of this product, it feels really luxurious! The lip balm is easy to use and apply; with the domed tip it definitely feels more like a balm. I was unfortunately not super impressed with the hydrating power of this product, as it actually felt quite dry on my lips. I thought the color was lovely though, and it did last for several hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely the funnest little lippy that I havenu2019t gotten in a long time I was very impressed with it state power and itu2019s beautiful color it gives just the right amount of color to make your lips look beautiful. The packaging is so unique but I love it I need to get more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the new Velvet Blur matte lip balm by SIMIHAZE and loved it. It is skincare-infused,and it feels so good when applying. I absolutely LOVE the packaging, it's super cute and definitely eye catching. It has a very unique dome shaped tip which I feel makes it easier to use. I also really like how you can use it 2 ways-either apply just like regular lipstick for a bold effect, or use your finger for a blurred look. This makes my lips look great, and feels so hydrating all day. I would definitely recommend trying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: VELVET BLUR has the cutest, most unique packaging and that's why drew my eyes to it first. The formula is actually so hydrating and smooth. I love using just one layer for a natural look, but definitely can build color with more swipes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free from simihaze. I love the packaging! Itu2019s So cute and retro! It has a nice heavy weight, and the color is gorgeous! The color worked more on my lips then checks but can be sheered out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this matte lip balm ! Itu2019s a very comfortable and hydrating matte lip balm. I love that this lip balm has buildable coverage.  The domed tip makes the lip balm so easy to apply. I got the shade Sunrise and itu2019s such a pretty nude pink. Definitely recommend trying this matte lip balm !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have recieved a velvet blur matte lipstick balm. The lipstick is a little dry but the color is very pretty. I was surprised to see how long lasting the lipstick is. I do feel the lipstick moisturizes my lips and looks really cute. I'm happy to be able to try this product. Thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was actually impressed with this lip balm. I tend to stay away from anything matte since it makes my lips feel very dry and uncomfortable but this wears so comfortably on the lips! I was also surprised to see this was very pigmented. I do regret the shade that I chose, Sunrise because it was just a bit too light on me and I honestly did not like the way it looked on me. Would I call this a lip balm? Probably not, it's more like moisturizing lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Wish I had more colors of this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this matte lip balm. Iu2019ve never used or seen a matte lip balm before this one. Usually matte lip products are drying and lip balms in general are not matte. This is my new favorite go-to lip product now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the design of this lipstick! Super cute color and compact. The magnetic closure is brilliant. The lipstick wear comfortably on the lips. I am very impressed with the brand! Will be checking out their other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would definitely recommend this lipstick to everyone! I love gorgeous color it matches my style and it keeps my lips so hydrated and healthy looking. BUT I truly dont like the shape of a tip - its simply doesnt match my lips shape ( they are not that full and big as every insta diva's nowadays) so minus one star coz I have to use brush for best application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the SIMIHAZE Velvet Blur Mini Lip Balm in Sunrise. This lip balm gives me a pop of color while keeping my lips moisturized. Super cute size. Doesnu2019t take up much room at all. I like the light green color on the outside. It makes it much easier to see in my purse. Very happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have you ever heard of a hydrating Matt lip balm? The new velvet blur lip balm from Simihaze beauty has surprised me. It applies very easily, it is very pigmented, and the finish is quite soft and not drying even though it eventually mattifies on the lips. The color does taper out after about two hours but it leaves behind a very pretty tint on the lips. The packaging is probably my favorite part of this lip balm. It feels so heavy, so luxurious, and the material feels like ceramic. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay SIMIHAZE. Iu2019ll be honest Iu2019m a sucker for itu2019s packaging, wasnu2019t sure if I was going to like it but itu2019s magnetic and it feels luxurious! The lipstick itself is extremely pigmented and glides on the lips smoothly. Canu2019t wait to pick up some more shades highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The matte lip balm is an excellent everyday lipstick. I have the shade sunrise and it's a beautiful nude pink, natural color that can be worn all year long.     The formula is hydrating and easy to glide on your lips. Very pigmented too- which I love! The packaging is also very aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is so cute and I love itu2019s magnetic-like closure. As for the lipstick itself, the color Lava is a gorgeous red color and itu2019s formula is very hydrating and long lasting. The only thing I was not crazy about was itu2019s bullet shape. I thought it was harder for me to apply with clean lines. Other than this, itu2019s great. Velvet Blur was given for free by Simihaze for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with how long lasting this vivid color is, I received the color lava it is a very vibrant matte red lipstick. I love that the case had a magnetic closing lid and the case is also super stylish and cute. The color was more like a lip stain on my lips because after clothing this color literally lasted all day. My only complaint is that it dried my lips out really bad, I do love a matte finish but for me and my skin type I would use this with a lip balm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this simihaze a vetvet blur matte lip balm,  i really love using it on my lips, I feel my lips gloss and moisturize , my lips is more beautiful with this lip balm, i can use it every where i go.I highly recommend it

reviews.review_title: For people who hate the feeling of matte lipsticks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm officially a matte lipstick lover now. First of all, Simihaze packaging is incredible and unlike any other makeup brand I've seen. Each bullet is truly a work of art. The lipstick itself is domed so it makes application super effortless and easy. Second of all, the formula is beautiful for a matte lipstick. It glides onto the lips and feels emollient like a lip balm, but it's simultaneously blurring and matte. It's like a blotted lip in a stick form. Over time, it becomes more matte on the lips, but I don't find it uncomfortable or overly drying. You can sheer it out super easily, but also build it up to full coverage. The formula actually reminds me a lot of recently released K-beauty matte lipsticks/tints. Definitely picking up more colors now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: oh my gosh! this packaging is to dye for!! I love it so much and the color is so fresh and bright, I love the variety of colors that are provided. and you can't go wrong with lipstick that leaves your skin so smooth and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing lip product! The packaging is beautiful and unique. The lipstick itself is matte, but feels hydrating and comfortable on the lips. I love how itu2019s shaped like a dome, and it makes applying the product so easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love matte but natural finish look. I also love that it is a lip balm also, so it does not dry out my lips like other matte lipsticks. The colors are very pretty. You can get wither the cold color look or the ombre look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tested Simihaze the Velvet Blur beauty product. I love the tiny little capsules these products come in. Packaging is everything!!! I love the color I chose. The color is called Lava. It's a deep ted. You can apply this product to your lips. The product is long wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an adorable and lovely lip product. I love how I can use this on my lips and have it tint them either sheer or very pigmented. I feel like the domed tip of this lippie helps for the texture of the lippie to apply much more evenly onto my lips. I love the color it leaves on my lips as it is very flattering and in my opinion great for any time of the day or any kind of season. This red is very classy and as enchanting as fine wine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So impressed with this unique lip product! The domed tip worked really well to create both a natural and full coverage look. The color is stunning, and works for both day and night looks. This lipstick really elevated my makeup.

reviews.review_title: Adorable packaging + a Beautiful Blurred Lip Look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Simihaze in exchange for my honest review.  I have the shade Windburn, which is described as a brown pink.  The packaging is very cool to look at, and the case is magnetic. The color is very true to the swatch on the site, and wears beautifully. The product is specified as long wear, but it is not transfer proof.  However, I would say that it is transfer-lite.  I found the formula to be comfortable to wear and I didn't have any issues with feathering or smearing. I should mention that this wears much more like a lipstick than a balm, but I like the texture and comfortable feel, and it has that trendy, soft lipstick-blurred look going on.  I will definitely be wearing this frequently. I think it's a great shade to transition into my Fall ones. I really like it, and I think it is absolutely cart worthy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this balm has very pigmented one swipe color that offers both sheer and full coverage.  I have the shade lava, which is a beautiful orange-red.  It feels weightless and comfortable with a nice matte finish that lasts for hours. Itu2019s so hydrating for my dry lips!  It has the perfect domed tip which makes for effortless application. And I love the cute packaging - I can conveniently pop it in my purse to take with me wherever I go!  I canu2019t wait to explore more of Simihazeu2019s offerings!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the versatility of this lipstick! It's easy to build up for a full look or keep light by blotting lightly. Even with the built up look, I found the lipstick to be very light! You really don't notice it or feel that it's there, but you can see the pigment! It's a true lightweight matte that doesn't dry out your lips. I'm going to be keeping this in my purse for everywhere I go! The magnetic cap is also a game-changer because I hate that my lipstick caps somehow get cracked by being in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick has SUCH an interesting texture. The brand says itu2019s a matte lipstick with all the comfort of a lip balm, and I find myself in complete agreement. This is an effortless, comfortable, and yet stunning lipstick!  The lipstick feels incredible, doesnu2019t emphasize lip lines, and yet does have a soft matte appearance. The packaging is also brilliant: it has a magnetic enclosure with firm magnets. No issues with carrying this in my bag. I was iffy on application, as I tend to prefer a pointed tip to my lip products, but somehow it does indeed work? I was pleasantly surprised.  The attached photo is natural light, no filters, and showing the shade u201cWindburnu201d. Not only is the color divine, but the finish truly meets the expectations described by the brand. Very pleased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the shade u201cSunriseu201d, and I thought that the shade is pretty cute! I love the packaging of this lip balm because it is definitely portable and compact. The lip balm itself also has a great coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is the most unique thing Iu2019ve ever seen! Itu2019s so cool and magnetic. The lip balm is the most smooth gliding lip product Iu2019ve tried AND itu2019s super pigmented which I feel like I canu2019t see as much. Absolutely love this and canu2019t wait to see what other products I try from them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I am not a Nude lip by go to is always a red lip. This is a beautiful shade of red, vibrant but also not too bold. The formula is very moisturizing and keeps my lips hydrated throughout the day and wear. The packaging is very cute and fun

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fun little seafoam green container this comes in. Has a magnetic lid which is great. The lip balm shade is sunrise, itu2019s a dusty pink rose color. It has a rounded shape to it. It goes on very velvety and feels comfortable on the lips. I like that you can wear it full strength or smudged out. Both ways are fun.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip balm is gorgeous! Itu2019s very pigmented, like an actual lipstick,  but it feels so nice on the lips like a lip balm. Also the packaging is so unique and I love the magnetic top! Really great to put in a purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not many lipsticks seem innovative anymore, but this one is an exception! The texture is lightly hydrating, and almost feels like a bomb while giving a really nice full coverage if you so desire and has a really pretty soft matte finish! I also love the packaging, which feels almost like a light weight, stone and beautiful, pastel colors, very different and definitely something I would recommend trying!

reviews.review_title: Nice for both sheer and full coverage lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the VELVET BLUR by SIMIHAZE and I love the way it makes my lips look. It provides really nice full coverage for my evening look. In the daytime I go with a more sheer application and it looks beautiful. I definitely would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipstick is so beautiful! I love how the actual formula glides on my lips and gives a blurring effect. the domed top helps me out a lot when it comes to putting lipstick on. The actual component is so cool Iu2019ve never seen something like this before!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product came in very chic and perfectly giftable packagaimg. I like the color payoff and build ability as well. Itu2019s a creamy and ways you to use formula great for all skin tones. Highly recommend using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such cute packaging it is mini and fits in your pocket and your purse and your checkbook wherever you might need it. The color is beautiful can be use so many different ways the pigment is so brilliant Iu2019m so obsessed with this tiny little lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such cute packaging it is mini and fits in your pocket and your purse and your checkbook wherever you might need it. The color is beautiful can be use so many different ways the pigment is so brilliant Iu2019m so obsessed with this tiny little lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the color of the Windburn shade matte lip balm gifted from Simihaze. Itu2019s a pretty nude like pinky peach color and not too dryingly matte honestly. I like the shape of the stick because it makes application easy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so nice! not too pink, and not too brown. Just the perfect combination. Glides on, and lasts long. There is not a thing I would change about it. Been buying this color for a long time, and this is my go to brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The SIMIHAZE Velvet Blur Matte Lip Balm is a beautiful and bouncy color for the lips. The formula is comfortable and cushiony on the lips. It feels lightweight and moisturizing. It glides effortlessly on the lips with a soft, matte finish. The shade Sunrise is a flattering, nude pink tone. The packaging is very cute and has a magnetic closure as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So many unique features! If you want matte finish but are bothered by dry/flaky lips spoiling the look, this is it for you! The balm like texture smoothens and moisturizes the lips. Additionally, use just one swipe for a light balm look or keep swiping for a more pronounced finish. The dome tip helps in easier application and the magnetic casing is just a beauty!
